isis.stitle: TSI 07-16-01 - Refrigerant Level in 2008 ProStar and HPV Models

subjectgroup.subject: Refrigerant Level in 2008 ProStar and HPV Models

geninfo.para: This TSI letter addresses the increases in refrigerant for proper operation of air conditioning systems using the thermal Expansion Valve (TXV) module in 2008 model year HPV and Prostar Vehicles.
4000, 7000, 8000 models with Daycab, Extended Cab and Travel Crew Vehicles,R134A Refrigerant charge is 36 ozs +2 ozs/-0 ozs. or 2.25 lbs.
ProStar Day Cab Vehicles,R134A refrigerant charge is 40 ozs + 2 ozs/-0 ozs. or 2.50 lbs.
ProStar Sleeper Cab Vehicles, R134A refrigerant charge is 48 ozs +2 ozs/-0 ozs. or 3.0 lbs.
Oil quantity has not changed, it is still 300 CCs of Pag Oil part number 2644034R1.
